item.title: Progress Update: Our Growing Partnership with Niger Foods
item.description:
In a step toward advancing agriculture in Nigeria, we have partnered with Niger Foods to deliver AI-powered advisory services to farmers in the Niger State. Through this collaboration, we deploy our Virtual Agronomist AI advisory service, providing maize, soybean, and rice farmers with real-time, data-driven insights to optimise crop management, improve soil health, and increase yields.

Having launched earlier this year, the initiative aims to support 10,000 farmers initially, expanding to 50,000 by the end of 2025. By leveraging technology to enhance productivity, this partnership is set to transform farming practices, improve profitability, and promote sustainability, creating a more resilient future for agriculture in Nigeria.

item.title: iSDA Africa Announces Exciting Partnership With Niger Foods
item.description:
In a significant step towards transforming agriculture in Nigeria, we are excited to announce a groundbreaking partnership with Niger Foods to deliver AI-powered advisory services to farmers in the Niger State!

As part of this partnership, we will deploy our Virtual Agronomist AI advisory service to provide maize, soybean, and rice farmers with real-time, data-driven insights and advice to enhance crop management and increase yields.

Our service will provide personalised recommendations for essential agricultural practices, including fertiliser application and pest control, tailored to the unique conditions of each farm and will assist the farmers in improving their soil health by identifying nutritional deficiencies and suggesting the application of the correct nutrient balance.
